title: Loading Screen Issues
body: Lately I have had multiple issues when it comes to loading into the game. It takes me roughly 5 minutes just to get off the black screen then I sit at 100% loaded. I use voice comms and my teammates all tell me they are in game already. I get in game anywhere between 5-10 minutes of the match so and I instantly get kicked for inactivity, so I then repeat the same process. As you can imagine I have acquired the leaver buster penalty for it. I have looked into it online and I cannot find a solution. I talked to support about this a year ago and they did not offer any real help. Does anyone have any ideas on how to fix this?????

replies.body: It sounds like you're having some network problems specifically staying connected to the game servers, which would end up showing as a black screen or disconnecting entirely.  Go over the trobleshooting steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your network and fix that up.  Let me know if you have any questions!
